title: The Vampire's Christmas
description: Amelia Patton regains consciousness bound naked and tied up with a big red bow -- under a Vampire’s Christmas tree! As if that’s not bad enough, the Vampire is no stranger – he’s the fiancé she dumped after he tried to kill her!David Tate, the handsome cop Amelia once planned to marry, wants more than to make amends. He wants Amelia. As David takes revenge for his broken heart, Amelia realizes she doesn’t mind one bit. There’s sweet magic in a Vampire’s kiss.
author: Angela Knight
